Huntington_Park.California Hospital Medical Center: Dignity Health-California Hospital Medical Center is located in the South Park district of downtown Los Angeles, California at 1401 S. Grand Avenue. The 318-bed community hospital has been serving downtown and its neighboring communities for well over a century. Dignity Health-California Hospital Medical Center is known for its wide range of medical services - from Obstetrics and Gynecology, to Orthopedics and Cardiology.
